channel.title: Project Epiphany 718/742 | 10 Players Daily | New Server |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/6dwdub.png[/img][/CENTER] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2cnf71x.jpg[/img] [B][COLOR="#0000FF"]Project Epiphany[/COLOR][/B] [B][COLOR="#00FFFF"]Where Your True Adventure Begins..[/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/npapqfgn4jifhkm/Project%20Epiphany%20718.jar"]Play Now![/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.projectepiphany.net46.net"]NEW Forums[/URL]
Features: - 11 Custom bosses - 25/25 Skills working - Prestige system up to 10 prestiges - Hans gives veteran capes based on your online time - 2 Quests - All the Matrix minigames and 3 others made by me - Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture - Dungeoneering where you can choose what you want to kill (Har'lakk the Riftsplitter or his minions) - Loyalty Points & Pk Points - The Abyss 100% like RS - Full Living Rock Caverns - Clue Scrolls - Over 20 NPC caves - Penguin Hide and Seek - 100% Bird’s Nests like RS
Home: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/259k1ew.png[/img] Teleports: [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/35n7xw6.png[/img] Shops: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/dfhio.png[/img]

Features:

  • 11 Custom bosses
  • 25/25 Skills working
  • Prestige system up to 10 prestiges
  • Hans gives veteran capes based on your online time
  • 2 Quests
  • All the Matrix minigames and 3 others made by me
  • Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture
  • Dungeoneering where you can choose what you want to kill (Har’lakk the Riftsplitter or his minions)
  • Loyalty Points & Pk Points
  • The Abyss 100% like RS
  • Full Living Rock Caverns
  • Clue Scrolls
  • Over 20 NPC caves
  • Penguin Hide and Seek
  • 100% Bird’s Nests like RS
